data.title: Top 10 Virginia Daily Newspapers by Circulation
data.text:
*Data as of July 2022.

1. The Virginian-Pilot

https://www.pilotonline.com/

News from The Virginian-Pilot in Norfolk, Virginia Beach, Chesapeake, Portsmouth and Suffolk, Va

2. Richmond Times-Dispatch

http://www.richmond.com/

News, opinion, sports and more from the Richmond Times-Dispatch.

3. The Roanoke Times

http://www.roanoke.com

The Roanoke Times is the leading source for local news in Roanoke, Salem, Blacksburg and Christiansburg, Va.

4. Daily Press

http://www.dailypress.com

Daily Press, based in Newport News, Va., covering Peninsula news and beyond in the Hampton Roads area of Virginia.

5. Bristol Herald-Courier

http://www.heraldcourier.com/

HeraldCourier.com is your news source for Northeast Tennessee and Southwest Virginia.

6. The News & Advance

http://www.newsadvance.com

The News & Advance provides local news, sports, weather, business, events, classifieds and jobs listings for Lynchburg, Virginia, and the surrounding area.

7. The Free Lance-Star

http://www.fredericksburg.com/

fredericksburg.com is your local source for news, entertainment and community information.

8. Daily News-Record

http://www.dnronline.com

Breaking news and more from Harrisonburgâ€™s newspaper.

9. The Daily Progress

http://www.dailyprogress.com/

For more than a century, The Daily Progress has been the leader in coverage of Central Virginia.

10. Suffolk News-Herald
